citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process from 1:15 PM to 1:45
PM on May 10, 2021.
During that time the inspector waited for 30 minutes and knocked on doors.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process from 1:15 PM to 1:45 
PM on May 10, 2021. 
 
During that time the inspector waited for 30 minutes and knocked on doors. 
 
 
 
End Section
